content: knitted tube socks in drops alpaca for baby and children size 1 month to 4 years see the green leaf jacket and jumpsuit patterns here 1 **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years foot length approx 10-11-12 14-15 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 50-50-50 100-100 g colour no 7300 lime double pointed needles size 2 5mm/us 1 or 2 or size needed to obtain correct gauge **pattern links ** norwegian version 2 french version 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/b14-3-green-leaf 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=10&lang=no 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=10
